scripts.build:all: npm run build common && npm run build demo && npm run build ide && npm run build settings && npm run build setup && npm run build sign-up
scripts.build:lcu: ng build lcu --prod --single-bundle && npm run pack
scripts.demo: npm run build:common && npm run start:demo
scripts.demo:lcu: npm run build:common && npm run build:lcu && npm run start:demo
scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:common && npm run deploy:lcu && npm run deploy:demo && npm run deploy:setup && npm run deploy:ide && npm run deploy:settings && npm run deploy:shell-host && npm run deploy:new-user && npm run deploy:user-access
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && npm run build:common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:demo: npm version patch --prefix projects/demo && npm run build:demo && npm publish ./dist/demo --access public
scripts.deploy:ide: npm version patch --prefix projects/ide && npm run build:ide && npm publish ./dist/ide --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu && npm run build:lcu && npm publish ./dist/lcu --access public
scripts.deploy:new-user: npm version patch --prefix projects/new-user && npm run build:new-user && npm publish ./dist/new-user --access public
scripts.deploy:settings: npm version patch --prefix projects/settings && npm run build:settings && npm publish ./dist/settings --access public
scripts.deploy:setup: npm version patch --prefix projects/setup && npm run build:setup && npm publish ./dist/setup --access public
scripts.deploy:shell-host: npm version patch --prefix projects/shell-host && npm run build:shell-host && npm publish ./dist/shell-host --access public
scripts.deploy:user-access: npm version patch --prefix projects/user-access && npm run build:user-access && npm publish ./dist/user-access --access public
scripts.pack:lcu: rimraf dist/lcu/wc && mkdirp dist/lcu/wc && npm run pack:main && npm run pack:pollyfills && npm run pack:join
scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:lcu
